help.title: Commands
help.description: For more information about a specific command, use `%s` or click on its name. For distinction between days and sleeps, click [here](%s).

invite.title: Invite
invite.description: Add the Christmas Countdown bot to your own server: [invite](%s)

reset.title: :white_check_mark: Server settings reset
reset.description: This server's settings have been reset to the defaults. Use %s to re-configure.
